name: Forecastly

name: ForecastRx

name: Helium10

name: HelloProfit

name: Jungle Scout

name: Keyword Tool

name: SellerLabs

name: EcomCrew Podcast
description: Real world e-commerce experience without any online marketing fluff!

name: Follow The Data

name: Keyword: The Amazon Insider Podcast
description: Hosted by Kate Valentine. Delivers authoritative content exclusively from former and current Amazon employees.

name: The Ecommerce Momentum

name: The My Wife Quit Her Job Podcast

name: JumpSend
description: Authored by Greg Mercer and Adam Zlotnik. Tips for sellers on how to increase reviews and listing optimization.
